itemDescription: Biochemist & Professor of Cellular Signalling at the University of Dundee, since 1994

wikipedia_page.main: (David) Grahame Hardie FRS, FRSE, FMedSci is a Scottish biochemist, and Professor of Cellular Signalling, at the School of Life Sciences, University of Dundee.
